entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
